snippet: Boeing’s announcement that it had started presenting airlines with an enhanced version of its 777 jet, rather than a whole new plane, underscores the shift.
abstract: Aerospace industry is pulling back from risky bets that have led to costly delays, seeking safer, more incremental path; Boeing's announcement that it has begun pitching enhanced version of its 777 jet, rather than a whole new plane design, underscores strategy shift within industry.
lead_paragraph: Boeing’s announcement that it had started presenting airlines with an enhanced version of its 777 jet, rather than a whole new plane, underscores the shift.

headline.seo: Aircraft Makers Shy Away From Risky Bets in Building New Planes
headline.main: Jet Makers Avoid Risk by Redoing Old Models
headline.print_headline: Jet Makers Avoid Risk By Redoing Old Models
